Rows.Name: Help
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "Help-Description", "Display a list of available commands")

Rows.Name: AdminSay
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "AdminSay-Description", "Display a message to all players")

Rows.Name: KickPlayer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "KickPlayer-Description", "Kick a player from the server with an optional reason")

Rows.Name: BanPlayer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "BanPlayer-Description", "Kick and ban a player from the server with an optional reason")

Rows.Name: UnbanPlayer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "UnbanPlayer-Description", "Unban a player from the server")

Rows.Name: ReturnToLobby
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "ReturnToLobby-Description", "Immediately returns the dedicated server to the lobby")

Rows.Name: ReturnToLobbyWhenEmpty
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_RCONCommand", "ReturnToLobbyWhenEmpty-Description", "Returns the dedicated server to the lobby as soon as the server is empty")
